skill.name: marketing-demand-acquisition
skill.description: Multi-channel demand generation, paid media optimization, SEO strategy, and partnership programs for Series A+ startups. Includes CAC calculator, channel playbooks, HubSpot integration, and international expansion tactics. Use when planning demand generation campaigns, optimizing paid media, building SEO strategies, establishing partnerships, or when user mentions demand gen, paid ads, LinkedIn ads, Google ads, CAC, acquisition, lead generation, or pipeline generation.
skill.summary: Multi-channel demand generation, paid media optimization, SEO strategy, and partnership programs for...
skill.author: alirezarezvani

security_audit.summary: All 81 static findings are FALSE POSITIVES. The analyzer incorrectly flagged markdown documentation formatting (backticks) as shell commands, marketing acronyms (CAC, CPA) as cryptographic algorithms, and standard analytics terminology as reconnaissance. The Python script uses only standard library with pure mathematical calculations, no network/filesystem access, and no sensitive data handling.

content.value_statement: This skill provides comprehensive frameworks for multi-channel customer acquisition including paid media optimization, SEO strategy, and partnership development. It delivers actionable templates and proven playbooks for LinkedIn Ads, Google Ads, HubSpot integration, and international expansion.
actual_capabilities: Create multi-channel campaign strategies across TOFU, MOFU, and BOFU funnel stages
Calculate and optimize Customer Acquisition Cost (CAC) using the Python calculator
Build LinkedIn Ads and Google Ads campaigns with targeting frameworks and bid strategies
Develop SEO strategies including technical audits, keyword research, and link building
Establish partnership and affiliate programs with co-marketing playbooks
Set up HubSpot attribution models and reporting dashboards for performance tracking
limitations: Does not provide direct API access to advertising platforms or HubSpot
Requires users to input their own campaign data and metrics for calculations
Templates and benchmarks are general guidelines, not platform-specific configurations
Does not execute campaigns or manage real-time bidding automation

use_cases.title: Plan Q2 Campaign Strategy
use_cases.description: Build a quarterly multi-channel campaign plan with budget allocation across LinkedIn, Google, and partnerships

use_cases.title: Develop Technical SEO Framework
use_cases.description: Create a technical SEO audit checklist and keyword strategy for organic growth

use_cases.title: Calculate Channel CAC
use_cases.description: Analyze blended and channel-specific customer acquisition costs to optimize budget allocation

prompt_templates.title: Campaign Brief
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a LinkedIn Ads campaign brief for targeting VP+ at Series A SaaS companies. Include budget, targeting criteria, creative framework, and success metrics.

prompt_templates.title: CAC Analysis
prompt_templates.prompt: Calculate the blended CAC given: LinkedIn $15k spend and 10 customers, Google Search $12k spend and 20 customers, SEO $5k spend and 15 customers.

prompt_templates.title: SEO Strategy
prompt_templates.prompt: Develop a tiered keyword strategy for a B2B SaaS project management tool. Include high-intent, solution-aware, and problem-aware keyword tiers.

prompt_templates.title: Partnership Outreach
prompt_templates.prompt: Write a partnership outreach template for approaching complementary SaaS tools about co-marketing opportunities. Include value proposition and partnership structure.

output_examples.input: Create a LinkedIn Ads campaign structure for enterprise B2B lead generation
output: Campaign Group: Enterprise ABM â†’ Campaign 1 (Awareness): Thought leadership content â†’ Campaign 2 (Consideration): Product education â†’ Campaign 3 (Conversion): Demo requests
Targeting: Director+ title, 500-5000 employees, tech industry
Budget: Start $50/day per campaign, scale 20% weekly if CAC < target

output_examples.input: Calculate blended CAC for these channels: LinkedIn $15k/10 customers, Google $12k/20 customers, SEO $5k/15 customers
output: LinkedIn CAC: $1,500 | Google CAC: $600 | SEO CAC: $333
Analysis: LinkedIn CAC is above B2B benchmark ($150-400), consider optimizing targeting or creative

output_examples.input: Outline a technical SEO audit checklist for a SaaS website
output: Pre-Launch: XML sitemap, robots.txt, HTTPS, PageSpeed >90, Core Web Vitals
Quarterly Audit: Screaming Frog crawl for 404s, redirects, duplicate content
Fix Priority: Critical â†’ High â†’ Medium issues

best_practices: Use multi-touch attribution (W-shaped model) for hybrid PLG/Sales-Led motions to credit full customer journey
Test campaigns for 2+ weeks with 1000+ visitors per variant before making optimization decisions
Establish clear SLAs (4-hour MQL response) between marketing and sales for lead handoff
anti_patterns: Do not use single-touch attribution models that ignore the nurturing influence on conversions
Do not stop A/B tests early before reaching statistical significance (95% confidence, 1000+ visitors)
Do not launch campaigns without UTM parameter structure and HubSpot campaign tracking setup

faq.question: What CAC benchmarks should I target for Series A B2B SaaS?
faq.answer: LinkedIn $150-400, Google Search $80-250, SEO $50-150, blended target under $300.

faq.question: How do I set up HubSpot multi-touch attribution?
faq.answer: Navigate to Marketing â†’ Reports â†’ Attribution. Use W-shaped model (40-20-40 split) for full-funnel credit.

faq.question: What budget should I allocate to LinkedIn Ads?
faq.answer: 40% of paid budget for B2B EU markets, 30% for US/Canada. Start at $50/day per campaign.

faq.question: How long should A/B tests run?
faq.answer: Minimum 2 weeks or until 1000 visitors per variant with 95% statistical confidence.

faq.question: What SEO metrics matter most?
faq.answer: Organic sessions, non-brand traffic %, keyword rankings (P1-P3), organic-assisted conversions, technical health score.

faq.question: How do I measure partnership ROI?
faq.answer: Track partner-sourced pipeline $, partner CAC, net new logos via partners, and co-marketing campaign ROI.
